description: Create a CSV export of selected contacts. Accepts CreateContactExportInput with contactIds (required, array of UUID, max 10000). Creates export job via ConnectraClient. Returns ExportResponse with exportId (UUID), downloadUrl (presigned S3 URL, valid 24h), expiresAt (DateTime), contactCount (Int), status (enum: pending, processing, completed, failed). Credits: 1 credit per 100 contacts (FreeUser/ProUser only). UserExport record created (non-blocking).
graphql_operation: mutation CreateContactExport($input: CreateContactExportInput!) { exports { exportContacts(input: $input) { exportId downloadUrl expiresAt contactCount status } } }
